name: Josh Allen
description: A strong-armed quarterback with exceptional athleticism and running ability. Known for his deep throws and ability to extend plays.

name: Patrick Mahomes
description: A highly skilled and creative quarterback with exceptional arm talent and improvisational skills. Can make throws from any angle and is a threat to run.

name: Jalen Hurts
description: A dual-threat quarterback with a strong arm and excellent running ability. A leader on the field with a knack for making big plays.
